original_text: Continue to think carefully about these commands in everything that you do. Tie them as signs onto your hands so that you remember them. Also tie them around your heads.
korean_text: 이러므로 너희는 나의 이 말을 너희의 마음과 뜻에 두고 또 그것을 너희의 손목에 매어 기호를 삼고 너희 미간에 붙여 표를 삼으며

sentences.original_text: Continue to think carefully about these commands
Tie them as signs onto your hands
Also tie them around your heads
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그것들을 당신의 머리 주위에 묶으세요
